Notifications

Notifications

Draw the users attention to specific information during a process.

On this page
  • Visual design
  • Guidelines for use

Visual design

Information notification

Design view:

Mobile design

Desktop designs can be viewed on screens wider than 650px.

Information notifications contain neutral information that the user may be interested in.

CSS styles

Desktop & mobile

Paragraph
p {
    color: #254F90;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    line-height: 28px;
}
Notification icon
.icon-information {
    color: #254F90;
    background: #FFFFFF;
    width: 40px;
    height: 40px;
}
Close icon
.icon-close {
    color: #254F90;
    width: 20px;
    height: 20px;
}
Container
div {
    background-color: #EFF4FB;
    border-top: 4px solid #B3C2D8;
    padding: 16px;
    border-radius: 0;
}

Confirmation notification

Design view:

Mobile design

Desktop designs can be viewed on screens wider than 650px.

Confirmation notifications let the user know an action has been successful.

CSS styles

Desktop & mobile

Paragraph
p {
    color: #297E28;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    line-height: 28px;
}
Confirmation icon
.icon-confirmation {
    color: #254F90;
    background: #FFFFFF;
    width: 40px;
    height: 40px;
}
Close icon
.icon-close {
    color: #254F90;
    width: 20px;
    height: 20px;
}
Container
div {
    background-color: #E8F4E8;
    border-top: 4px solid #A6D5A6;
    padding: 16px;
    border-radius: 0;
}

Warning notification

Design view:

Mobile design

Desktop designs can be viewed on screens wider than 650px.

Information alerts contain neutral information that the user may be interested in.

CSS styles

Desktop & mobile

Paragraph
p {
    color: #D2201E;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    line-height: 28px;
}
Warning icon
.icon-warning {
    color: #254F90;
    background: #FFFFFF;
    width: 40px;
    height: 40px;
}
Close icon
.icon-close {
    color: #254F90;
    width: 20px;
    height: 20px;
}
Container
div {
    background-color: #FCE9E9;
    border-top: 4px solid #F5B5B5;
    padding: 16px;
    border-radius: 0;
}
